title: IC2实验版在重启后导致电线断开(变点)的问题解决办法
author: VKurst
txt_content:
本帖最后由 VKurst 于 2014-8-25 05:21 编辑 

我朋友这边开了个服，是工业服与魔法的服。
但是开服没多久就出现了一个很令人头疼的BUG，也就是重启后电线断开的问题。
这个问题@darkice1_0 的服也出现了。



这个BUG的表现就是 重启后服内的部分电线会断开，而且后台有如下类似提示
15:41:21 [WARNING] EnergyNet.addTileEntity: ic2.core.block.wiring.TileEntityCable@6a210db (ic2.core.block.wiring.TileEntityCable@6a210db) is conflicting with ic2.core.block.wiring.TileEntityCable@42f127d using the same position (alrea
dy added, prev. te not removed, overlapping), aborting
15:41:21 [WARNING] EnergyNet.addTileEntity: ic2.core.block.wiring.TileEntityCable@200ca66 (ic2.core.block.wiring.TileEntityCable@200ca66) is conflicting with ic2.core.block.wiring.TileEntityCable@5b3ba63 using the same position (alrea
dy added, prev. te not removed, overlapping), aborting
15:44:09 [WARNING] EnergyNet.removeTileEntity: ic2.core.block.wiring.TileEntityCable@1478e5b (ic2.core.block.wiring.TileEntityCable@1478e5b) wasn't found (added), skipping
15:44:09 [WARNING] EnergyNet.removeTileEntity: ic2.core.block.wiring.TileEntityCable@d32e5cb (ic2.core.block.wiring.TileEntityCable@d32e5cb) wasn't found (added), skipping
++++复制代码


MCBBS发帖问技术问题很少有大神来回答...
于是我就转向国外网址和论坛

然后我就在Cauldron的Github上发现了这个：
https://github.com/MinecraftPortCentral/Cauldron/issues/1208
          dexli        commented    12 days ago  

                      Sorry for taking so long, ran to some unexpected technical difficulties and could not get around testing until now. It all seems fine with the build number 144, using Multiverse 2.4-AB and IC2 2.0.397 experimental and keepSpawnInMemory set to false. Cables do not get disconnected and everything seems fine after warping to different worlds or going away from the cable-containing chunks and coming  back. 
Only thing I noticed was that specifically my creative world got completely unloaded (from multiverse) after warping away from there to another world, but I expect this is a problem with something else and have not yet got around trying to figure it out. Also this is not really a problem since I can always just load it back again (currently there is only admins playing on the server anyways). I will let ya know if I figure out what the problem is. 
Thousands of thanks to you @bloodmc , this saved the minecraft experience for a few friends and me for the foreseeable future! This project is simply awesome and I raise my hat to you! As far as I know the issue is solved.
看不懂不要紧，我讲给你听。

使用Cauldron服务端安装了IC2实验版，并且服务器内使用了Multiverse-Core插件。
那么你需要将玩家们生存的世界的参数 keepSpawnInMemory 改为 True。

这样无论你怎么重启，电线都不会断开了，问题就解决了。

更改方法：
管理员在游戏中或者后台输入 /mvm set keepSpawnInMemory true 世界名
或者
在插件配置目录中找到 Multiverse-Core\worlds.yml
然后找到你要修改的那个世界，将     keepSpawnInMemory: 'false' 改为     keepSpawnInMemory: 'true'
配置文件大概是这样的：
  world:
    ==: MVWorld
    hidden: 'false'
    alias: 主世界
    color: WHITE
    style: NORMAL
    pvp: 'false'
    scale: '1.0'
    respawnWorld: ''
    allowWeather: 'true'
    difficulty: HARD
    spawning:
      ==: MVSpawnSettings
      animals:
        ==: MVSpawnSubSettings
        spawn: 'true'
        spawnrate: '-1'
        exceptions: []
      monsters:
        ==: MVSpawnSubSettings
        spawn: 'true'
        spawnrate: '-1'
        exceptions: []
    entryfee:
      ==: MVEntryFee
      amount: '0.0'
      currency: '-1'
    hunger: 'true'
    autoHeal: 'true'
    adjustSpawn: 'false'
    portalForm: ALL
    gameMode: SURVIVAL
    keepSpawnInMemory: 'true'
    spawnLocation:
      ==: MVSpawnLocation
      yaw: ***
      pitch: ***
      z: ***
      y: ***
      x: ***
    autoLoad: 'true'
    bedRespawn: 'true'
    worldBlacklist: []
    environment: NORMAL
    seed: '******'
    generator: 'null'
    playerLimit: '-1'
    allowFlight: 'true'

顺便at一下MCBBS的Multiverse-Core搬运者@wolski ，建议添加一下说明。






{:10_512:}我朋友的30人魔法工业服

Fantastic☆娱乐生存 Q群：373032439

replies.txt_content:
黑小白 发表于 2014-8-25 07:17
断开又没事，还好看。。能连接电就好了
断开之后不会传导电能，而且机器也要重放一遍，不然连紧贴的机器都不能互相导电，更别说连接电缆了。
